name: django-cf
description: `django-cf` is a Python package that seamlessly integrates your Django applications with various Cloudflare services. Utilize the power of Cloudflare's global network for your Django projects.

scripts.setup-durable-objects: cd templates/durable-objects && npm run dependencies && rm -rf python_modules/django_cf && cp -r ../../django_cf python_modules/django_cf
scripts.setup-d1: cd templates/d1 && npm run dependencies && rm -rf python_modules/django_cf && cp -r ../../django_cf python_modules/django_cf
scripts.setup-test: pip install -e .[dev] && npm run setup-durable-objects && npm run setup-d1
scripts.upgrade-templates: cd templates/durable-objects && uv add django-cf --upgrade && cd ../d1 && uv add django-cf --upgrade
